pages.text: A machine that takes water as input, outputs rotational energy to the top and water to the lower bottom side. Use $(l:industrialrenewal:dam/turbine_shaft)Turbine Shaft$() to transfer rotation. $(br2) This machine consumes 200 buckets (default) of water per tick and will releases the same amount for output. If water is not drained, rotation will rapidly drop to 0.

Can generate rotation faster if using $(l:industrialrenewal:dam/high_pressure_pipe)high pressure pipe$() as input pipe and if pipe is connected to an intake.$(br2)Can generate higher maximum rotation if using $(l:industrialrenewal:dam/high_pressure_pipe)high pressure pipe$() as input pipe and if pipe is connected to outflow
